raw_title: DIAS – Mrs SUMANA (94 years of Meritorious life)
raw_body: DIAS – Mrs SUMANA (94 years of Meritorious life). beloved wife of late Cyril Dias,​ loving sister of late J.A.J. (Jimson) Perera,​ late Nanda Pieris,​ late Chandra Liyanage,​ J.A.W. Perera (Ivan),​ Rev. Dehiwala Mahinda,​ expired on 24th October 2023. The remains will lie at No. 10,​ Pieris Place,​ Quarry Road,​ Dehiwala. Cortege leaves at 4.15 p.m. for Cremation at 5.00 p.m. on 25th October at “Nisala Arana Cemetery”,​ Kohuwala.068362
